name: Preschool Program
description: The program's curriculum that is progressive, changes with the children includes: Literacy Learning, French Language, Art, Science, Math, Body Mouvement, Outdoor Play Color Me French does not provide lunch – Please bring your own
fullDescription: The program's curriculum that is progressive, changes with the children includes: Literacy Learning, French Language, Art, Science, Math, Body Mouvement, Outdoor Play Color Me French does not provide lunch – Please bring your own
whatTheyOffer: The program's curriculum that is progressive, changes with the children includes: Literacy Learning, French Language, Art, Science, Math, Body Mouvement, Outdoor Play Color Me French does not provide lunch – Please bring your own
howToGetIt: Admission process: 1. Contact by e-mail or by phone. Please include your name, phone number and age of your child. 2. They will email you about availability. 3. Based on space availability, a tour will be scheduled with the director. Tours are given on Sundays. Please come with your child. 4. After the tour, Email to confirm final interest of enrollment. You be informed of your child's reservation spot, along with payment details.
cost: This is a fee based service.
